body:
This demonstrates the problem for me with `normalized=False` and`centered=False` (notice the off by 1):
```python
arr = np.zeros((1,11,11, 1), dtype=np.float32)
arr[0, 5,5] = 1
arr = tf.constant(arr)
glim = tf.image.extract_glimpse(arr, (1,1), offsets=[(6,6)], normalized=False, centered=False)
sess.run(glim)
```
```
> array([[[[ 1.]]]], dtype=float32)
```
